item.title: November --- Quote of the Month: -------------- "Help us to see what IS there instead of what ISN'T!" "
Kodi Box Maintenance: Be sure to unplug your modem for 2 minutes then power back on to reduce buffering issues.
------ We wish you and your family a safe and Happy Thanksgiving! Feel free to call or text us anytime at (440) 703-0093 with any questions or issues.-------
